title: Font pairing
content:
I designed a logo for my business that sells scarves, using all Sans Remo. I had it critiqued on here and many and I agreed that the name was not legible. I would like to know if there is a nice, legible font that I can use to pair with Sans Remo (I really like the way this font looks). Thank you in advance. This is Sans Remo.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2014-04-30 at 10.43.13 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204631/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202014-04-30%20at%2010.43.13%20AM.png) | 33.92 KB |
author: Tannathan

comments.content: Call me mindbogglingly crazy if you want to, but the first thing I thought of was a Bank Gothic.

A revival of Fleischmann would be quite nice I think.

hhp
thank you guys. will check those out. :)
